# categorySummaryFormat

**Instance Property**

A format string for the summary description used when the system groups the category’s notifications.

## Declaration

```swift
var categorySummaryFormat: String { get }
```

## Getting the Information

- **identifier**: The unique string assigned to the category.
- **actions**: The actions to display when the system delivers notifications of this type.
- **intentIdentifiers**: The intents related to notifications of this category.
- **hiddenPreviewsBodyPlaceholder**: The placeholder text to display when the system disables notification previews for the app.
